select a.goods_id goodsId, a.goods_name goodsName, a.goods_state_id goodsStateId, a.one_classify_name oneClassifyName, a.two_classify_name twoClassifyName from t_info_goods a where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.goods_state_id = 1
